name: Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA / イースVIII-Lacrimosa of DANA-
description: Ys returns with a brand new adventure for the first time in 8 years! Adol awakens shipwrecked and stranded on a cursed island. There, he and the other shipwrecked passengers he rescues form a village to challenge fearsome beasts and mysterious ruins on the isolated island.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8.1/7 64-bit Processor: Core i3-2100 3.10 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 650 Ti DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 30 GB available space Sound Card: Onboard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8.1 64-bit Processor: AMD FX-8320 8-Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon R7 370 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 30 GB available space Sound Card: Onboard
